DOC.brief_summary: The pseudo tyrosine kinase receptor 7 ( PTK7 ) orphan tyrosine kinase receptor assign planar cell polarity pathway . PTK7 express normal myeloid progenitor CD34 ( + ) CD38 ( - ) bone marrow cell human . It also express acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) mostly assign granulocytic lineage differentiation . In AML , PTK7 seem convey promigratory antiapoptotic signal cell represent independent prognosis factor survival patient treat induction chemotherapy . This study aim : - evaluate impact PTK7 expression primary AML cell ex vivo - evaluate diagnostic prognostic value soluble form PTK7
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year AML diagnosis , previously treat Treatment induction chemotherapy Signed informed consent Affiliation French social security system pregnant woman ( childbearing potential ) breastfeed woman emergency patient deprive liberty place authority tutor
